Tecmo TV Games Unit Coming in 2005!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2004 Topics (Year of the Venture): Tecmo TV Games Unit Coming in 2005!
By Lisa Shock on Monday, September 13, 2004 - 06:41 pm:

I just found THIS news about JAKKS Pacific licensing some Tecmo NES games for one of their controller games. They already make several popular units, basically a controller that has games pre-loaded on it which connects directly to a TV set. Looks like it will cost $20, same as the other TV Games units.
